text: The shielded worm lizard (Leposternon scutigerum) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposternon Category:Reptiles described in 1820 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Hemprich Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Brazil
title: Shielded worm lizard
